Package importedImplementations.SanguptaBloom.bloomfilter.core

Interface BitArray

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
FileBackedBitArray, JavaBitSetArray, MMapFileBackedBitArray
public interface BitArray extends Closeable
A contract for all implementations of bit-arrays. This provides specific methods that will be needed for working with bloom filters.
Since:
1.0
Author:
sangupta
